name: Post-Content SEO Optimization
scope_note: How search engines crawl, interpret, rank, and distribute already-written content
purpose: Ensure search engines can efficiently crawl, understand, and rank content after it is written, without changing the core message, intent, or tone.
application_timing: Apply only after content creation is complete.
core_principle: Layer C focuses on execution and alignment, not writing quality or persuasion.

1_correct_search_intent_mapping.description: Confirm the page targets the correct dominant search intent.
apply_after_writing: Verify dominant SERP intent for the primary keyword
Ensure page format matches top-ranking results
prohibitions: Forcing transactional keywords into informational content
Targeting multiple intents on a single URL

2_optimized_title_tag.description: Title tag should clearly reflect the primary value or answer.
prohibitions: Repeating the same phrase multiple times

3_optimized_meta_description_ctr_focused.description: Meta description reinforces value and outcome, not a full summary.
prohibitions: Promises the content does not deliver

4_proper_heading_hierarchy.description: Headings communicate structure, not SEO manipulation.

5_internal_linking_contextual.description: Internal links support understanding and navigation.
best_practices: Link to parent and supporting topics

6_url_structure_slug_optimization.description: URLs should be readable, stable, and intent-aligned.

7_schema_markup_supportive.description: Schema clarifies content for machines; it does not directly rank content.
best_practices: FAQ schema only when FAQs exist

8_image_optimization.description: Images should support understanding and accessibility.
prohibitions: Decorative images used as SEO signals

9_core_web_vitals_page_experience.description: Strong content must not be undermined by poor UX.

10_crawl_indexation_control.description: Ensure pages are discoverable and indexable.

11_eeat_support_signals.description: Content should align with site-level trust indicators.
prohibitions: Anonymous content on sensitive or YMYL topics

12_topical_authority_reinforcement.description: Each page should exist within a clear topical cluster.

13_serp_feature_compatibility.description: Structure content to qualify for enhanced SERP features.

14_content_freshness.description: Freshness matters only for time-sensitive topics.

15_monitoring_iteration.description: SEO performance should be observed and refined over time.
best_practices: Track AI Overview and snippet appearances
Improve clarity and structure where needed

16_meta_description_best_practices.description: Meta descriptions help users and search engines assess relevance and value.

17_internal_linking_intent_aligned.description: Internal links should support comprehension and hierarchy.
best_practices: Add links where they provide contextual clarity
prohibitions: Fixed link count or placement quotas
